messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] re:intro +reading Q
messages.msgSnippet: I’m not Barbara.  But I’ve used realebooks and have had lots of fun with it!  Once I made my first book, Connor, my oldest thought it was a cool idea and
messages.messageBody:
I’m not Barbara.  But I’ve used realebooks and have had lots of fun with it!  Once I made my first book, Connor, my oldest thought it was a cool idea and now wants to take pictures to make a book.  Cool!

Shan

-----Original Message-----
From: Bronwen [mailto:felesina@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 10, 2003 12:34 PM
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] re:intro +reading Q

Barbara Barbara!! Hi! hi!!

You sound Great and FUN!!

Here is a really fun link! I had a lot of fun myself with it, my book is
really funny (well some people think it is funny! - well, maybe only me..)
You make up books!

http://www.realebooks.com/

Oh gosh it is fun..

I am so glad to hear your "voice"!

Love,
Bronwen
